item.title: [Android] Layouts
item.description: Get user input in an app: Part 1 Class hierarchy An arrangement where classes are organized in a hierarchy of parents and children. Parent / Superclass / Base class Any class with one or more child classes. Use super to reference properties and functions. Child / Subclass Any class that is below another class. Use override to override properties and functions. Root / Top-level class

item.title: [Android] Kotlin basics
item.description: 紀錄一下 2022 Android Study Jam 一系列的學習筆記～ 去年參加半途而廢有點可惜 😭 趁著今年有些時間的時候好好學習，順便練練英文閱讀與聽力（？），充實自己！ Introduction to Kotlin Kotlin is the recommended programming language for developing Android apps. Program as series of instructions for the system to perform some action. For example, write an instruction to print Hello, World! : fun main() { println("Hello, world!") } Using keyword val to define read-only variables. val score = 90 println("You got ${score}!") var keyword can reassign variables.
